# {%= name %} {%= badge("fury") %}

> {%= description %}

## Install
{%= include("install-npm", {save: true}) %}

## Run tests

```bash
npm test
```

## Usage

```js
var get = require('{%= name %}');
var obj = {
  a: {locals : {name: {first: 'Brian'}}},
  b: {locals : {name: {last: 'Woodward'}}}
};

get(obj, 'a.locals.name');
//=> {first: 'Brian'}

get(obj, 'b.locals.name');
//=> {last: 'Woodward'}
```
